languages.text:
The Daemonette clouds the mind of their enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies.
This effect can be removed with medikits, {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Get Back in the Fight!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, or the death of the Daemonette.
languages.original_text: Демонетка затуманивает разум противника, заставляя сражаться против союзников. Этот эффект можно снять, использовав медкомплект или {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Никаких оправданий! или убив демонетку.

traits.locale_text: The Daemonette clouds the mind of their enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies. This effect can be removed with medikits, Get Back in the Fight! ability or death of the Daemonette.
The Daemonette clouds the mind of their enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies. This effect can be removed with medikits, Get Back in the Fight! ability, or the death of the Daemonette.

The Daemonette clouds the mind of their enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies. This effect can be removed with medikits, Get Back in the Fight! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, or the death of the Daemonette.

The Daemonette clouds the mind of their enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies. This effect can be removed with medikits, Get Back in the Fight! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, or the death of the Daemonette.

languages.text:
欲魔会蒙蔽敌人的思想，让他们自相残杀。
此效果可以通过医疗包或{g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}回去战斗！{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}移除，也可以通过杀死欲魔来移除。
languages.original_text:
The Daemonette clouds the mind of their enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies.
This effect can be removed with medikits, {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Get Back in the Fight!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, or the death of the Daemonette.

traits.locale_text: 欲魔会蒙蔽敌人的思想，让他们自相残杀。 此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}可以通过医疗包或回去战斗！{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}移除，也可以通过杀死欲魔来移除。
欲魔会蒙蔽敌人的思想，让他们自相残杀。 此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}可以通过医疗包或回去战斗！{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}移除，也可以通过杀死欲魔来移除。

languages.text: デモネットは敵の精神を混乱させ、敵同士で戦わせる。 この効果はメディキット、戦線に復帰せよ！{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、もしくはデモネットを倒すことで取り除ける。
languages.original_text: The Daemonette clouds the mind of their enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies. This effect can be removed with medikits, Get Back in the Fight! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, or the death of the Daemonette.

traits.locale_text: デモネットは敵の精神を混乱させ、敵同士で戦わせる。 この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}はメディキット、戦線に復帰せよ！{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、もしくはデモネットを倒すことで取り除ける。
デモネットは敵の精神を混乱させ、敵同士で戦わせる。 この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}はメディキット、戦線に復帰せよ！{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、もしくはデモネットを倒すことで取り除ける。

languages.text:
La diablilla ofusca la mente de su enemigo, haciendo que se enfrente a sus aliados.
Este efecto se puede eliminar con un botiquín, la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}¡Vuelve a la formación!{/g} o la muerte de la diablilla.
languages.original_text:
The Daemonette clouds the mind of their enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies.
This effect can be removed with medikits, {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Get Back in the Fight!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, or the death of the Daemonette.

traits.locale_text: La diablilla ofusca la mente de su enemigo, haciendo que se enfrente a sus aliados. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} se puede eliminar con un botiquín, la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} ¡Vuelve a la formación! o la muerte de la diablilla.

languages.text:
Демонетка затуманивает разум противника, заставляя сражаться против союзников.
Этот эффект можно снять при помощи медкомплекта или {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Никаких оправданий!{/g}, или убив демонетку.

The Daemonette clouds the mind of their enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies.
This effect can be removed with medikits, {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Get Back in the Fight!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, or the death of the Daemonette.

traits.locale_text:
Демонетка затуманивает разум противника, заставляя сражаться против союзников.
Этот эффект можно снять при помощи медкомплекта или {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Никаких оправданий!{/g}, или убив демонетку.

Демонетка затуманивает разум противника, заставляя сражаться против союзников. Этот эффект можно снять, использовав медкомплект или {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Никаких оправданий! или убив демонетку.

languages.text:
Die Dämonette vernebelt den Geist ihres Gegners und zwingt ihn, gegen seine Verbündeten zu kämpfen.
Dieser Effekt kann durch Medikits, die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Zurück in den Kampf!{/g} oder den Tod der Dämonette entfernt werden.
languages.original_text:
The Daemonette clouds the mind of their enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies.
This effect can be removed with medikits, {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Get Back in the Fight!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, or the death of the Daemonette.

traits.locale_text: Die Dämonette vernebelt den Geist ihres Gegners und zwingt ihn, gegen seine Verbündeten zu kämpfen. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} kann mit Medikits, mit der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Zurück in den Kampf! oder dem Tod der Dämonette entfernt werden.

languages.text:
La démonette trouble l'esprit de son ennemi et l'oblige à se battre contre ses alliés.
Les médikits, la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Retournez au combat !{/g} ou la mort de la démonette permettent de neutraliser cet effet.
languages.original_text:
The Daemonette clouds the mind of their enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies.
This effect can be removed with medikits, {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Get Back in the Fight!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, or the death of the Daemonette.

traits.locale_text: La Démonette trouble l'esprit de son ennemi et l'oblige à se battre contre ses alliés. Les médikits, la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Retournez Au Combat ! ou la mort de la Démonette permettent de neutraliser cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}.

languages.text:
İblisiçe, düşmanının zihnini bulandırarak onu dost birimlerine karşı savaşmaya zorlar.
Bu etki; sıhhiye çantaları, {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Mazeret Yok!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} veya İblisiçe'nin ölümüyle ortadan kaldırılabilir.
languages.original_text:

This effect can be removed with medikits, {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Get Back in the Fight!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, or the death of the Daemonette.
